H0.text: Marjorie Courtenay-Latimer discovered which rare fish in 1938. Coelacanthid

H1.text: Marjorie Courtenay-Latimer discovered which rare fish in 1938. Latimeria

H2.text: Marjorie Courtenay-Latimer discovered which rare fish in 1938. Mola Mola

H3.text: Marjorie Courtenay-Latimer discovered which rare fish in 1938. Xelacanth

A4.text: On 22 December 1938, the first Latimeria specimen was found off the east coast of South Africa, off the Chalumna River (now Tyolomnqa).

A5.text: The first living species, Latimeria chalumnae, the West Indian Ocean coelacanth, was described from specimens fished off the coast of South Africa from 1938 onward;
